snippet: The city is installing audible door alarms at public schools to prevent another tragedy like the disappearance and death of a student with autism in 2013.
abstract: Officials say New York City is installing 21,000 audible door alarms at public schools to prevent another incident like 2013 disappearance and death of autistic student.
lead_paragraph: The city is installing audible door alarms at public schools to prevent another tragedy like the disappearance and death of a student with autism in 2013.

headline.main: New York City Schools Installing 21,000 Door Alarms
